biotools.summary: SpecI is a species identification tool using genomic sequences to delineate prokaryotic species. It facilitates fast, accurate and automated taxonomic assignments of newly sequenced genomes based on comparisons of 40 universal, single-copy phylogenetic marker genes extracted from a comprehensive database of sequenced prokaryotic genomes.

bioschemas.name: SpecI
bioschemas.summary: SpecI is a species identification tool using genomic sequences to delineate prokaryotic species. It facilitates fast, accurate and automated taxonomic assignments of newly sequenced genomes based on comparisons of 40 universal, single-copy phylogenetic marker genes extracted from a comprehensive database of sequenced prokaryotic genomes.
